long_description: Made from a smooth fleece sweater fabric, the REI Tofino jacket combines great style with functional warmth. This cool-weather essential won't spend much time in your closet. Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R), sweater-knit fleece is dense without being bulky; it's breathable, repels light wind and has a water-resistant, non-pilling outer face. Cozy tunnel collar with one exterior button keeps your neck warm, and the brushed lining is soft next to your skin. Exterior and interior wind flaps prevent cold spots at the front zipper. REI Tofino fleece jacket has 2 zip handwarmer pockets and 2 drop-in interior pockets.
short_description: Made from a smooth fleece sweater fabric, the REI Tofino jacket combines great style with functional warmth. This cool-weather essential won't spend much time in your closet.
